quest.name: Return of the Holyfist
journal: Hamon would request your aid in his training.
In order to complete his comeback, Hamon requests that you spar with him once more. Meet your guildmaster at Forgotten Springs in southern Thanalan to receive further instructions.
By way of a warm-up for your bout, Hamon bids you defeat five of the sandworms that inhabit the area south of Forgotten Springs.
You have defeated five sandworms. Report back to Hamon.

No sooner does your training end than Chuchuto arrives bearing news that Weggfarr has returned to Ul'dah, and is demanding that Hamon come for the rematch. Make your way to Emerald Avenue, where the odious marauder awaits.

To his great shock, Weggfarr finds himself downed by Hamon before he can even swing his axe. Unwilling to admit defeat, he resorts to using a substance he calls pluto to enhance his strength, and comes at you in a frenzy. With Rurukuta fighting beside you this time, you succeed in overcoming the marauder and his minions. Make your way to the Pugilists' Guild, where Hamon awaits.

In no small part due to your help, Hamon has defeated his long-standing rival, and the future of the guild is secure. Having realized the error of his ways, Rurukuta declares his intent to embark on a journey of self-discovery. Hamon bids you continue dedicating yourself to your training, that you might one day become a legend in your own right.
objectives: Speak with Weggfarr on Emerald Avenue.
Speak with Hamon at the Pugilists' Guild.
Use Snap Punch on Hamon Holyfist three times!
Defeat Weggfarr Wideaxe and his minions!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I'm pleased to say I managed to find and thwack all the dummies. You did well to deploy them where you did, lassson. Thanks to you, I almost got killed several times!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: But what doesn't kill you only makes you stronger, and I'm feeling stronger than I have in ages. As a matter of fact, I reckon I'm not far from regaining my former strength. One last step will get me there, and I'll take it by having another bout with you, Forename.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I want you to meet me out in the Sagolii Desert, at a settlement called Forgotten Springs. The place is home to the most luscious Miqo'te maidens this side of Eorzea! Gods, I can't wait to take in their lovely forms again!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Come to Forgotten Springs out in the Sagolii Desert. Gods, I can't wait to behold the luscious maidens there again!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: I'm to hold the fort while you and Master Hamon train out in the desert. See you upon your return!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: This landscape takes me back, it does. Sand as far as the eyes can see... Crystal-clear spring waters cooling your feet... Scantily clad lasses giggling as they bathe and frolic...

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: <sigh> I well remember these things, but my body has forgotten the seamless combinations that earned me the epithet of Holyfist.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: That's where I'd have you enter, Forename. Sparring with you is what first got me back into the swing of things. Now it's time to finish the job. But before we begin, some warming up is in order.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I want you to take yourself across the dunes to the south and defeat five sandworms. I'll be waiting for you here.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: What? Don't I need a warm-up, too? Oh, don't you worry, I had mine long before you arrived. Those enormous buggers never knew what hit them!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! If you don't want to be outdone by this old man, you'd best run along and give them more of the same!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Have you seen to the sandworms yet? Don't keep me waiting too long─my joints are starting to stiffen up.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Return of the Holyfist”?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Ah, so you've seen to the sandworms? Marvelous! Now the real training can begin!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, I've managed to get most of my stamina back. I'm confident that I can go the distance with the fittest of them.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: But if I'm to defeat Weggfarr, I'll need more than just endurance; I'll need to remember how each strike transitions to the next. And you're going to help refresh my memory...by pummeling the sense back into me!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: <cough> <gasp> I've...I've got it!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: As a river flows to the sea, heedless of all that bars its path, so too must our combinations be! Ooh, that even rhymes!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename! The raging torrent of your blows has been as a strike of lightning to my braincase. I remember...everything!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: M-Master! It's Weggfarr! The man is back in Ul'dah, and he's demanding that you fight him─now!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: So it begins... Very well, I will go to settle the score with Weggfarr. He will be the first to know that the Holyfist has returned!

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: Heh, I didn't expect ye to come so soon, if at all. Ye sure ye want to go ahead with this? I'm a man o' reason, an' I'd sooner not have to hurt ye. Just give up now, an' we can put an end to this mummer's farce. Ye can live out the rest o' yer days in peace.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: The only mummer's farce I see is a man trying to squirm out of his own self-wrought challenge. Well, I'm going to make you the same offer: walk away, and you won't get hurt.

dialogue.name: MOBA
dialogue.text: They say Hamon Holyfist is going to perform his legendary technique!

dialogue.name: MOBAB
dialogue.text: Right here on the avenue!? Is it safe!?

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: Gahaha! I see age has robbed ye o' yer wits as well as yer strength!

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: Well, if yer so eager for pain, who am I to deny it to ye? Jus' remember, there ain't no goin' back once yer head goes flyin'.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Just like old times... Eh, Weggfarr?

dialogue.name: MOBC
dialogue.text: (-Crowd-)Hurrah!!!

dialogue.name: MOBD
dialogue.text: Did you see that!? Because I sure as hells didn't! He was too fast!

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: Nooo! Th-This can't be! I refuse to be beaten by a senile old fool!

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: Get yer arses out here, all o' ye!

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: 'Case yer wonderin', that was pluto!

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: Just a draft of it, an' yer body turns hard as iron! Not even blades can pierce it!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hmph, stubborn bugger...

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Rurukuta!? But...why?

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: I refuse to fight on the side of cheats.

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: Gahahahahaha! Say yer prayers to whatever gods ye keep!

dialogue.name: WEGGFARR
dialogue.text: By the time I'm finished, not even yer mothers'll recognize ye!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: <huff> <puff> You...you did it, Master Hamon! You won!

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: Master...

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: No, Chuchuto─we won. This victory wasn't mine alone.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Holy fisticuffs, that was incredible! You wiped the avenue with those crooks!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I'm going to tell my grandchildren tales of what happened here!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Our work here is done. Let's all go home─to the guild!

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: The guild hasn't changed one bit...

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I want to thank you again, Forename. It's because of you I was able to rekindle my fighting spirit and conquer my demons.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Perhaps even more importantly, Rurukuta's come to his senses, and Chuchuto's back to her bubbly self.

dialogue.name: RURUKUTA
dialogue.text: Please forgive me, Master. I will have no more to do with the Alacran. I will roam the land till I find myself, and strive to become a great pugilist like you.

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: You've only just returned, and you're leaving us already? <sigh> I don't suppose there is aught I can say that will change your mind. But if you ever want for company or a sparring partner, know that you're always welcome here.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! Youthful vigor's a truly blessed thing! Go well, my boy. There's not a doubt in my mind that you'll do me proud.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: As for you, Forename. Your combinations were a sight to behold...and right painful to receive. In helping me with my training, you've come into your own as a pugilist.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: The time's ripe that I taught you the technique that won me countless bouts on the bloodsands.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: I call it “Demolish.” Unleashed when in the coeurl form, it combines powerful punches and kicks that'll send your opponent reeling.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: You have grown strong, Forename, but your journey as a pugilist is far from over. To get as far as I have, you'll have to overcome many and more trials and tribulations.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: But whatever challenges threaten to block your way, I'm confident that you'll be able to blaze yourself a path.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: So long as your spirit burns bright and your fists fly with conviction, there's nothing you can't achieve. I'm the living proof!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Forge onward, young one, and create a legend for yourself never to be forgot!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Hit me, Forename! With everything you've got!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Don't hold back!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Urgh! That's it! Give me more!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Yes! This pain... I can feel it working!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: This feeling... This is it!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! This is what I call growing pains!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Now we fight! This time I'm going to give as much as I get!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: I'm not finished yet!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Ngaaah! Mark me, the next round...will be mine...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! Nothing can keep me down!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Brace yourself, Forename! I've a mind to finish this!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah! I'm nothing if not persistent!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: <huff> <puff> I...I have it!

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“Return of the Holyfist”?

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: INSTANCE
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Gahahaha! I'll lop off yer heads an' shite down yer necks!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: You leave Weggfarr to me!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: You heard Master Hamon! We take care of the minions!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: I have your back!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Bloody hells, Weggfarr is maiming his own!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Utter madness!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Keep clear of Weggfarr!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Gahahaha! Yer tough as old mutton, Hamon!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Mayhap I'll try summat tenderer...like a slice o' yer adorable students!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: No, Weggfarr! It's me you wanted to fight!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Watch out, Forename! Weggfarr comes!
